name: Cringe Castle
description:
Everyone loves exploring old castles, right? Just like how everyone hates all the inexplicable sawblades and spikes that strange old castles tend to have. You're no exception, involuntarily cringing away from them whenever you get near. Fortunately for you, this desire to get far away from traps may be exactly what you need to make your way through the castle.

A 2D platformer with 10 short levels.

Movement: A and D or arrow keys
Jump: W or Space Bar
Restart level: K
Return to main menu: M

Made by Anopob and Neil for Sonicworkflow's Valentine's Day Jam 2021. The theme was "cringe".

https://itch.io/jam/sonicworkflows-valentines-day-jam
